revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = HiWiFi |model = HC6361 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/26/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/HiWiFi_HC6361 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL128SAIF00; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MT29F32G08CBACA; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5DU5162ETR-E3C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw_cpu = <!-- true, --> |sw1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D4:EE:07 |oui = D4:EE:07
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;3.10.36;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = NAND Flash (32 Gb);Micron;MT29F32G08CBACA;29F32G08CBACA;1;,,, USB 2.0 Flash Disk controller;SkyMedi;SK6226;SK6226, BAPMC4, A1317, S6A432.2;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.199.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = HiWiFi_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^HiWiFi_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = China only ? |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00E93Z720 |asin_country = CN |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Additional storage (4 GB per the shown MT29F32G08CBACA NAND) is available to the device via the on-board [http://www.skymedi.com.tw/chinese/P_Items.asp?P_ID=23&T_ID=2 SK6226] USB 2.0 (High-Speed) Flash controller.
OpenWrt based Source Code https://code.hiwifi.com/, note that is not original firmware. :Checkout code need register.
See also HiWiFi HC5661/HC5663/HC5761/HC6361..
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hiwifi/hc6361 ''HiWiFi HC6361'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ([https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hiwifi/hc6361_old pictures]) :The Xtal frequency is 25MHz.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/hiwifi_gee/hiwifi_gee_hc6361 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/hiwifi/hc6361 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |unsupportedfuncntions = Stock bootloader unsupported, a secondly bootloader should be added. |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> File:HiWiFi_HC6361_ext_front.jpg|external shot on top of a TP Edge File:HiWiFi HC6361 runningOpenWrt.jpg|accessing it's shell via the serial, still on the Edge File:HiWiFi HC6361 ext bottom.jpg|bottom of the unit (Made in China) File:HiWiFi HC6361 with box.jpg|with its box </gallery> <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:HiWiFi HC6361 board top orig.jpg|board top File:HiWiFi HC6361 board top.jpg|board top, annotated File:HiWiFi HC6361 3 pads.jpg|three pads, used later File:HiWiFi HC6361 board bottom.jpg|board bottom File:HiWiFi HC6361 UART @ TP1 + TP2.jpg|UART test pads (TP1 + TP2) File:HiWiFi HC6361 Prolific PL2303 UART dongle.jpg|PL2303 dongle used File:HiWiFi HC6361 UART soldered.jpg|UART setup finished (board -> PL2303 -> ext. USB data lines) File:HiWiFi HC6361 16 MB Flash (FL128SAIF00).jpg|16 MB NOR Flash chip File:HiWiFi HC6361 casing up.jpg|partially in of case </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
